remarks: A magma right and left identity element keeps the other elements unchanged.  (Contributed by FL, 12-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmpidelt.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
cmpidelt.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
cmpidelt $p |- ( ( G e. ( Magma i^i ExId ) /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( U G A ) = A /\ ( A G U ) = A ) ) $.
